values: When love that is true, comes into your life. It changes you. All ideas of what love was before are erased. All pain of the past was worth the experience and the journey, just to reach this point. Someone worthy of the gift of your soul and heart, and life, and devotion. And total trust and belief. Nothing can compare. What joy and sunshine, and to be loved the same. :)

Why sometimes, when the phone rings-
Do I think it will be you?

What is wrong with me that I can even think that?
I know it will never happen,
I know you are gone forever,

days and months go by,
you still occupy my thoughts.
The last time  you called,
I missed it.
The last oppourtunity to ever hear your voice again.
I missed it.
I never knew it would be the last time.
We never do.

I look for your face in people I meet.
everything is different now.

I try to block and forget.
It is still there.

and sometimes, when the phone rings.....

Dammit.
It's beena week since I hurt my knee again. It's not really getting better-- I'm worried about permanent damage. It's a freaking rip off all the way around.  Just  when The studio is almost done so I can start slamming artwork.  I'll get up in there and work on artwork anyhow- I don't need my knee for that--but it's a bitch with the stairs.  Too, I cant do my regular walking and exercise.  No pushups?  Try doing them in any manner with one leg.

I'm addicted to the exercise. I need it.  Stress relief and general well being.  I haven't been depressed in a while, and with the working out I can forgo much of anything negative.
It all affects the things I can do that have nothing to do with  if I even HAVE legs.  I can study and do my  art.  But I need the balance in order to do all of it well.  Winter is comming and I see some patch of  ice with my name on it  :(  This year,  I hate winter.  I dont want to deal. 

Duck fucker.  =P

You know,  I can handle just about any challenges life throws my way.  But comon.  This is dirty pool.  I guess if it was something I didn't feel bleak about it wouldnt really be a challenge.
How are you supposed to keep your ass nice if you can't really exercise it?

Problem solving;  Step one:  identify  the problem.  List all possible solutions,  including the ludicrous to loosen creativity.

BAH--boo hoo.  Action comes after a big dose of "poor me".  It's a bitch when you DO plan and  work towards things to have to pick out the monkey wrenches.

rrrrrrrrr

"There are moments in our lives, there are moments in a day, when we seem to see beyond the usual - become clairvoyant. We reach then into reality. Such are the moments of our greatest happiness. Such are the moments of our greatest wisdom. It is in the nature of all people to have these experiences; but in our time and under the conditions of our lives, it is only a rare few who are able to continue in the experience and find expression for it. At such times there is a song going on within us, a song to which we listen. It fills us with surprise. We marvel at it. We wouild continue to hear it. But few are capable of holding themselves in the state of listening to their own song. Intellectuality steps in and as the song within us is of the utmost sensitiveness, it retires in the presence of the cold, material intellect. It is aristocratic and will not associate itself with the commonplace - and we fall back and become our ordinary selves. Yet we live in the memory of these songs which in moments of intellectual inadvertence have been possible to us. They are the pinnacles of our experience and it is the deisre to express these intimate sensations, this song from within, which motivates the masters of all art."

-Robert Henri
A friend of mine did this.  Was so sweet of him :)  He suprised me with it.
I love this jacket. It's a black velvet cavelry coat. Slit up the back, long. Sweet. Can you tell what it is under my hand? (er, the hand that's not on my chest, silly--)

Sunshine on cool days
skittering leaves
flittering about 
like herds of small
spastic animals

foloing the whims of breezes
to and fro
whirling and dancing

to the twitter and squawk
clouds of bird dance
joy on the same whims of breeze
congregating on phone wires
contemplating and bitching
return of winter

smell of snow
frost demon morning visits
beauty in shades of grey
punctuated by trees
screaming defiant retreat
in fire blasts of 
orange
red 
and yellow


peace  :)
judy cooke 2005

Learning something doesnt mean immediate implementation.  Unfortunately.

I know now that caffiene and lack of sleep  lead me right into being depressed.  I can go a couple of days without penalties, but, any more than that I can get really  bleak. AAAnd, of course all this week i've been drinking Tea and coffee to help me get alot done.
The good thing is,  knowing it helps to temper it.  It will pass. As long as I dont make any final, life altering decisions, all will be well.

After what  i've been thru the last few months,  there's been big change.  I'm calm.  I never realised I carried  drama and excitiability from  music and the stage into real life.  It was a big part of my personality. Lol. I'm glad that it is gone. I don't have room or desire for all that garbage in my life.  It's better to be calm and patient.  Impatience,  that's alot of what it was.  And,  whatever will happen will happen. I can't change people and what they  think, or what they decide to do.  Not caring so much,  being detached.  At least for now is fine. I have faith that the person I am, will not lose the important things, the good things thru change.  It is not in my desire or my  nature to be bitter and spiteful.

Art school spoiled me. Where else can you push the envelope so far?   I had such a blast there. Drama?  Cram hundreeds of temperamental Artists into one building and check out what happens.
I remember throwing a fit in life drawing one day.  Couldnt get the work to do what i wanted.  Threw my stuff accross the room, knocked over the easel, walked out. LOL, wasnt really that upset, just wanted to see what would happen really--not a word was said.  EVER.  And OH did I play up the scene as I stormed thru the room.
Walked into one classroom another semester, plopped my feet up onto the teachers desk, his chair.    He walked in, raised his eyebrows, and continued on like it was the most normal thing in the world.  LOl. God I loved that place.
One semester,  I didn't show up for the first two weeks of school.  Got all A's in my classes.  Except photography,  he refused to budge cause  I didnt pay enough attention to HIM.  I started experimenting with the film right away,  in the dark room, everywhere. He didn't think I foloed procedure enough.  He was right,  I told him so--but, boy that B burned me more than anything else.  (he didnt know I was afraid of the dark and the  darkroom  was hard for me to overcome  =P)

People with Mohawks, piercings, multicolored hair, painted faces, leather, music,  costumes in the middle of the school day--just because. Lots of fun and open minded people.  The teachers were so cool.  I'd love to  accomplish stuff just to validate how much faith some of them had in me.

Someone nominated me for who's who in junior colleges.  I got it. I still to this day dont know who did that.  No one would ever let me know.   :(     I should look some of them up.  Go visit the school. Being accepted for,  and liked for, who you are is the best  gift anyone can ever give you.

Thot I was rid of something.  Just had it buried.  Life can suck when you care. It can be a fight to remain postitive and to push forward in productivity.
And it  only took something small to bring my day down.
I can see why it's easier to harden your heart than  to love freely.  :(
sigh

It's hard to understand.
Why people choose freely to be evil and mean,  to cause pain to others.
We ALL go through pain.  And feel pain  acutely and deeply.
Why,  knowing this, knowing how it feels, would someone want to inflict that on anyone else?
Some people actually get great pleasure hurting someone else. Finding  vulnerablilities and exploiting them.
What could  have happened to someone, that they can justify that?
I understand that  some persons are actually born defective. Pathological. Some are abused. 
But,  that doesnt explain those who know, and choose to not care.
How can you expect to go thru life with no retribution?  That it wont come back to you?  That, no matter how you believe, or feel,  That just by being that way to others, if nothing else, you will cripple your ability to trust.  If you cannot trust, there is no love.  And you will kill all good things to fufill your own predictions of the  negative way things are. 
What you do to others, becomes your curse. Your living hell of knowledge.

You cannot escape yourself.

I think the big mistake is to try to understand.  At least past a certain point. Understanding does not change the fact it is wrong. 
I tried to understand someone  so much it was killing me.  It was messing with my head. It made me horribly insecure and unsure of how to be.  It was dragging me down- into their negativity.
The only understanding that can occur is within the person themself. And usually only after great pain so they will have to face it.  People like this will push it  til there is no where to hide from truth. Life will become more and more narrow, empty, dark and painful.  They will lose more and more.  They will squelch what does not desert them.
They do not understand unselfish acts. They can only judge by the empty coldness inside themselves that they live with everyday.  That is hell.  That is utter lonliness.

And I would never wish  this on anyone.

It is not power to hate.  That is easy and childish. It is a strong emotion, but, it lies.  Like drugs lie.
Power comes with responsibility.
To choose what's right. To choose. 
It is responsibility  and  power when you can crush someone, easily,  and don't.  When you can spot their innermost vulnerabilities- and leave them alone. When you could be rude,  and choose to help.  When you come out of yourself and are nice when all you might want to do is hurt someone.
That is all great strength.
To  allow some asshole another day of existance, so they might learn from thier mistakes.

It is easy to react like an animal.  It feels good.  But it is no accomplishment and means nothing.

We are here to learn.  Suffering  in life is  proportionate to  the level of learning we are not doing.  The thicker the  head, the harder the thump has to be to get thru.


Like an alchoholic, or other substance abuser, the only one who can help someone like this, is themself.  And usually,  they have to lose everything, have nothing but the misery they  chose for company, before they see themselves for what they really are.

Facing truth is liberation. Self delusion is death.
Choosing the easy way is death.

We all have ugliness inside us.  To not see  it is to cripple and imprison ourselves. Only those things we are blind to trip us.  Only those fears we do not face are those that own us.  Fear is powerless unless you give it permission. We are both the ugliness and the beauty that we see inside.  Our dreams are meant to be fulfilled, but cant be when we are crippled. Then our dreams are there to haunt and taunt us.
The first step is to forgive yourself for being human and faulty. Self forgiveness is not permission to do.  But, understanding.
If you don't learn from your mistakes,  you are destined to repeat them until you do.

Personally,  I'd rather graduate to the next class.  Skinning your knee (metaphorically) is a small price to pay for the  knowledge and attendant skills learned.   Fire is hot,  it causes pain.  The pain  is a good thing stupid.  =P  It doesnt make fire a bad thing.

Cheers
 :)

Some people are just Evil and empty.

They will live hell and eat forlorn.
Blind, stupid, and self centered.
What you put out you will recieve back tenfold.

I release any positive stay I have on karma and retribution.
People like this have much learning and suffering to do.
Anything else is wasted on them.

Meeting people online,  close to where you live,  or relatively so can be problematic.  Some of them just want to jump all over it right away.

Gee,  how about a conversation?  If you don't reach me thru my mind--you can't reach me at all.

___________________________________________________________________

Funny,  but,  for me--the most intimidating part of the art work is the sketching. I don't get it.  I think it's all the times im outside workiing on something and people have to come up to look at the stuff in early or sketch stages.  They  usually  can't understand it--
And I don't want to bother to explain.  It's not for them at that point--but,  WHO KNEW it was a performance art--  o.O

_______________________________________________

And will somebody PLEASE O PRETTY PLEASE tell me how to get these stupid Icon pics to fill the  space that is provided????? I can get them  the 100  by 100 Pixel but they are too small--it's an argh! situation to the nth degree!!

I haven't told Jay yet  what the doc said.   I dont want to stress these ppl.  And I dont want to be treated differently.
It's not honest. But, there's no easy way anyhow you look at it. I would be pissed if someone didnt tell me. But,  it's my choice. My life.

I miss my motorcyle
I miss my guitar
I miss running

I want to go camping on horseback again. 4 days to a week riding and setting camp. You appreciate how spoiled we are in this society and THANK GOD FOR SHOWERS!!!!!  It's fun.


Did you know,  Scientists have found that nearly any animal fed the typical American diet becomes schitzophrenic?  Look around you.
HMMMMM-

Not playing the game  much anymore. 

Too many friends  gone now for various reasons.  I'm constantly meeting new people  and potential friends, not like it's hard  for me to  talk to  people or anything, but,  my heart isn't in it anymore.
It seems just as easy to talk to people in other medium and actually make connections that are going to be more productive in areas that I'm interested in.

The internet is awesome,  I can meet so many more people faster than ever possible in a RL face to face chance encounter.
With a larger pool to choose from, it's so much easier to  find pple with similar interests and more open minds. To weed thru the fearful,  the simple,  and the shallow.
And there really are  some great people out there in the world.  
I've paid my dues,  and my time is comming- wahoo!

Better than a book for education, able to fly --and faster than a speeding bullet--hehe

I decided.  Gonna learn Tae Kwan Do.  

Jon,  you were the  final seller in that.  It seems to fit what I was looking for in  martial arts.  And I'm pondering the furballs-lol

Pete lives close enough he prob knows somewhere near enough that  is convinient for me. (He's the guy that threatens to put me down  like a dog if I dont behave. I guess doing that to his son left an impression.  lol.  But the kid had fair warning and he's a little sweetheart now to me :)

Want to learn to do a pull up  with only one arm.  Jennifer Garner  and Angelina Jolie scarred me.  Them and the hispanic chick in Alien. =P

Taking classes for the Tae Kwon Do;  glad I don't embarrass easy--bet you money I'll be surrounded by kids.  Kids are great, esp in a hoagie roll or after u put em down. Kidding-gee.  They love me, and for some reason can relate to my uber ultra maturity so well =P


Embarrassment is good for you--it points out an issue that needs to be resolved.

Stiletto is comming along fine- sketches posted soon.
Need TM  and copyright searches done on  some things.  
Is Spyder LaCroix a regular friend?  A sometimes aquaintance and spin off?  Dunno-  can't be a reg freind cause it ruins the basic psychology of the character.
Got to get the tech straight --need better equiptment fo sho.  How many ppl told me  not to get the all in one scanner ect?  And brother?  puleeeeeez--im getting my affairs together so I  can  be shot for that one =P

Saw some hollywood journal pages and stuff- made me really ill how uber cool they were- nothing like high jadedness to bring out the noober.
 
mienen edumacation has lept off the cliff face for the needed tech--weeeee!

I NEED  studio production software for the animation--  can wing it with  alot--school taught me how to scrape it off the sidewalk and present it as genius.

And baby, I can talk to anyone :)  
I don't like sales,  but,  when  I'm on--I can sell a dead dog and create a desperate need for it.

wahooo
Go release and renew energy --gotta go work out

I will not return hatred
with hatred.

No matter how easy it makes things for me.

I am not a coward.

Am told my veins wont really hold up to dialisis. (spelling?)
They like to collapse.
I do remember last time in for kidney infection,  I ended up having to be taken off IV because they couldn't get  a vein to hold up.  It was hard enough to get a vein in the first place. Called it rolling veins or someting. wtf
They said  thy have some things they might be able to do-but , of course  I don't get to know anything til after  tests.
I hate doctors :(

still there is sunshine
bloom where u are planted
i'm stronger than I thot I was

Ever eaten  rattlesnake?

This was  a thing from years ago.  I just got done eating a piece of chicken--and for some strange reason I remembered it.
They brought  home the snake, (huge) sans head, writhing vigorously like it  was looking for it's head.
I was told to skin it and cook it.
(yikes)
I skinned it-it was still moving.
I cut it into pieces-it was still moving.
I cooked it.  Thanks god it stopped moving.

yep,  it tastes like chicken.
Freakin southerners will eat anything  =P

Anyone  out there know what is good animation studio software?  And maybe where to go to get it?

Don't  walk outside with your mouth open for any reason--There are Kamikazi bug pilots who's very lives are dedicated to the pursuit of such idiots. And trust me--a most unpleasant experience.
AAAAACCK!

Nothing slams you into perspective like knowing you might be dying. =P


Bloom where you are planted.

Every problems has a gift of equal or greater value within it.

summer falls on spring sweethearts
and rips them apart
the memories fall from trees
blown farther away by the winds of time
hidden from view by winters cold hands
gone forever just like they should be

thats why winter is my favorite time of year

down there, there is no snow
the memories are there forever
never going away
maybe thats why hells so hot
the memories never die
they're stuck in the branches of your mind

It was foggy and beautiful in the  park today.
This time of the year, the spiders are all grown and hunting  furiously.   It is not the time to walk under trees.  Webs are everywhere.
I'm not a fan of spiders, but, I find them fascinating at a distance.
The mist in the air left tiny beads of water on the strands of the webs.  With the fog in the air and the light just right, it was a beautiful  show of glittering, sparkling lights.
The webs were everywhere.  I'm going to have to incorporate the imagery into a painting.
There was a  christmas tree pine that had webs  all over it, sized and spaced like purposeful decorations.
All very nice.
Saw a turtle,  a little too far from the water- had a dread picture of the  dog getting his nose latched onto-  =P
But,  all was cool.

It makes it much harder to let something go,
when you look deep inside,
and find 
you dont really want to.
:(
dammit

They used to burn people and drown babies with marks like these.If I had been born in an earlier time, I wouldn't have lived much past 20.  If I even made it that far.If I didn't get drowned by heretics; childhood ear infections would have gotten me.  Or I would have gotten into trouble with my nearsightedness, curiosity,  and tendency to explore. If I lived thru that, my wisdom teeth would have been the final kill.  Three of which were impacted and had to be shattered to  remove.  Growing pretty much at least a 45% angle straight  into the  other teeth.  That would have been a slow and  horrible death.We are so spoiled in this society.

Nice meeting pple online from Jersey and Pa.
Intellingent and interesting ppl.
Sounds like fun.

Du hatte lieben fur mich.
Anfst haber vor es.  So sehr.

Und dann fortgeschaff vor es.
Aber Du hatte kein enziges wort gesagt fur warum.

Ich habe nich verstanden.

Naturlich, danach am verworrensten und haltlos worden.
UND danach Ich weiss nicht, wasich tun soll.
   
Wo is ihr verstandnis?  Wo is verzihung?

Jeder Kann sich mal irren.

Ich bin verletzt.  Verseihen sie mich?
Du schadest fur mich. Ich bin geschadet.

Im arsch.

Was gefurchtet hatten, du hast tun mich mir.
Aus welchem grund?

Wegen gefurchtet,  hassen du hast fur mich.
Gefurchtet leiben.

Wenn ich sturbe von meine nieren, dann du hast sich faule ausrede fur mich hassen.

Herr Einzelherz, Keineherz

Maybe you should stop judging me  by how you see yourself--
Mr. Dim  and Dismal.

Go back and re-read your journal entries.
objectively.

You actually have the nerve to judge  how i am  
and would be to you or anyone else,
by depressed entries in this  journal???


I wish I could hate you sometimes.
It would be easier.
